name: Windows XP Unsigned Style
summary: Learn about .MSSTYLE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: MSSTYLE files are similar to .MSSTYLES files, but are not digitally signed. Since Windows XP only supports signed themes, the uxtheme.dll, shsvcs.dll, and themeui.dll files must be patched in order to use the unsigned themes.

description: Theme or "style" that can be applied to the Windows XP interface; includes custom images, colors, icons, and other elements; allows users to change the overall look and feel of the Windows desktop.
